titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the Honorable Percy Sutton be recognized as primarily responsible for the rebirth of the legendary Apollo Theatre of Harlem and as a trailblazer in business, politics, telecommunications, and law.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 7/22/2004--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that Honorable Percy Sutton be recognized as primarily responsible for the rebirth of the legendary Apollo Theatre of Harlem and as a trailblazer in business, politics, telecommunications, and law.
